info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 3:44PM EDT until August 04 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Otsego County in central New York... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 343 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Laurens to near Cobleskill, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Worcester, Middlefield, Hartwick, Maryland, Cooperstown, Edmeston, Westville, Burlington, Westford and Milford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
